title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and detects when a new object enters the view.

title: Movie Recommender System
description: Developed a recommendation engine using Natural Language Processing to identify patterns in movie genres and tags. Delivering high-accuracy suggestions to imporve user engagement

title: Customer Churn Predictor
description: Strategic Machine Learning solution using Random Forest and 440k data points. This project identifies critical churn factores and optimizes model precision to help businesses improve customer retention.

title: Job Acceptance Predictor
description: Machine Learning model designed to predict the probability of a candidate accepting a job offer. It analyzes historical hiring data and cadidate profiles to optimieze recuitment workflows.

title: SUNAT Asset Seizure System
description: Relational databases developed in Oracle SQL Developer to automate the seizure and dispatch of confiscated goods. This project involved generating strategic datasets to validate business metrics and ensuring high data integrity throughout the customs inspection workflow.

title: INEI: Lima Labor Market Analytics
description: A comprehensive dashboard analyzing labor dynamics in Metropolitan Lima using official INEI data (EPEN 2025).
